players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob, can you tell me what you saw last night?"
Bob: " I saw Diana walking around the village last night, and then she was gone. I also saw Charlie talking to someone in the shadows."
You: "I'm innocent, I didn't kill Diana. I was just talking to myself in the shadows."
